:::Windrazor:::

::He smiled at Hot Rod.  The world sure has turned upside down in this war.  
Windrazor was once a Decepticon and Hot Rod is an Autobot.  They should be 
enemies, but now they fight beside each other.  What a strange war this is::

--part1_9d.e05e64d.275da915_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>:::Windrazor:::
<BR>
<BR>::He smiled at Hot Rod.  The world sure has turned upside down in this war.  <BR>Windrazor was once a Decepticon and Hot Rod is an Autobot.  They should be <BR>enemies, but now they fight beside each other.  What a strange war this is::</FONT></HTML>
